medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 1 year of age with syncope while riding a tricycle and recurred at 2 years during dancing. Cardiac arrest occurred at age 3. Initially experienced syncope during exertion or emotional stimulation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient underwent an implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) placement and left cardiac sympathetic denervation (LCSD) surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents were considered unaffected with normal ECGs; negative personal and family history of cardiac-related events.
